PluginInstance

description: Constructor

name: getFeed
description:
Fetch the feed created by this plugin instance from the REST API
(only for fs plugins, 'ds' plugins resolve to null).

name: getPlugin
description: Fetch the plugin associated to this plugin instance item from the REST API.

name: getPreviousPluginInstance
description:
Fetch the parent plugin instance of this plugin instance from the REST API
(only for 'ds' plugins, 'fs' plugins resolve to null).

name: getDescendantPluginInstances
description:
Fetch a list of plugin instances that are descendents of this plugin instance from the
REST API.

name: getParameters
description:
Fetch a list of plugin instance parameters associated to this plugin instance from
the REST API.

name: getFiles
description: Fetch a list of files created by this plugin instance from the REST API.

description: Constructor

name: getPlugin
description: Fetch the plugin associated to this plugin instance list from the REST API.

description: Constructor

name: getPluginInstance
description: Fetch the plugin instance associated to this parameter item from the REST API.

description:
Fetch the plugin parameter definition associated to this plugin instance item
from the REST API.

description: Constructor

description: Constructor

description: Fetch this item resource from the REST API.

description: Return true if the item resource object contains any item data.

description:
Internal method to fetch a related resource from the REST API referenced by

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: get
description:
Fetch this list resource from the REST API using limit and offset as optional
parameters.

name: getSearch
description: Fetch this list resource from the REST API based on search parameters.

name: isEmpty
description: Return true if the list resource object contains any item data.

name: hasNextPage
description:
Return true if the list resource object has a next list page in the
paginated REST API.

name: hasPreviousPage
description:
Return true if the list resource object has a previous list page in the
paginated REST API.

name: getItems
description:
Get an array of item resource objects corresponding to the items in this
list resource object.

name: getNextPage
description: Fetch the next resource page from the paginated REST API.

name: getPreviousPage
description: Fetch the previous resource page from the paginated REST API.

name: _getNextOrPreviousPage
description: Internal method to fetch the next or previous page from the paginated REST API.

name: _getResource
description:
Internal method to fetch a related resource from the REST API referenced by
a link relation in the collection object.

name: ./APIReference.md

content:
{
  "name": "@fnndsc/chrisapi",
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "description": "JavaScript6 client for the ChRIS API",
  "main": "dist/chrisapi.js",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "webpack",
    "precommit": "lint-staged",
    "start": "karma start",
    "test": "karma start --single-run",
    "docs": "esdoc -c esdoc.json"
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "src/**/*.{js,jsx,json,css,ts,tsx}": [
      "prettier --write",
      "git add"
    ],
    "*.{js,jsx,json,css,ts,tsx}": [
      "prettier --write",
      "git add"
    ]
  },
  "prettier": {
    "printWidth": 100,
    "singleQuote": true,
    "trailingComma": "es5",
    "overrides": [
      {
        "files": "*.css",
        "options": {
          "useTabs": false,
          "tabWidth": 2
        }
      }
    ]
  },
  "author": "",
  "license": "MIT",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "^7.0.0-beta.49",
    "@babel/core": "^7.0.0-beta.49",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.0.0-beta.49",
    "@types/chai": "^4.1.3",
    "@types/mocha": "^5.2.1",
    "@types/sinon": "^5.0.1",
    "babel-loader": "^8.0.0-beta.2",
    "chai": "^4.1.2",
    "husky": "^0.14.3",
    "karma": "^2.0.2",
    "karma-chai": "^0.1.0",
    "karma-chrome-launcher": "^2.2.0",
    "karma-cli": "^1.0.1",
    "karma-mocha": "^1.3.0",
    "karma-sinon": "^1.0.5",
    "karma-webpack": "^3.0.0",
    "lint-staged": "^7.0.0",
    "mocha": "^5.2.0",
    "prettier": "^1.11.1",
    "sinon": "^5.1.0",
    "webpack": "^4.11.1",
    "webpack-cli": "^3.0.8",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "axios": "^0.18.0"
  }
}
name: package.json
